snippet: To the Editor:    Re ''California Goes to War Over Math Instruction'' (front page, Nov. 27): The question of which method of teaching math ''works better'' is just as unanswerable as ''Which method of transport is better -- bus or airplane or bung...
lead_paragraph: To the Editor: Re ''California Goes to War Over Math Instruction'' (front page, Nov. 27): The question of which method of teaching math ''works better'' is just as unanswerable as ''Which method of transport is better -- bus or airplane or bungee cord or shank's mare?'' The ''works better'' has to be decided in terms of a goal.
abstract: Prof Thomas C O'Brien letter disputes November 27 article on debate in California over math instruction (S)

headline.main: New Math Instruction Doesn't Ignore Basic Skills; Terrorized Children
